data.heading: Water animals
data.rubric: Click on any of the labels to know more about water animals.
data.text: Water animals have bodies that help them to live in water.
Many water animals have fins to help them swim.
Many water animals have gills to help them breathe underwater.
Some water animals like dolphins and whales do not have gills. They have to put their heads above the water surface to breathe.
data.Caption: fish
octopus
eel
dolphin
